parameters.query: SELECT name FROM M_Product_Category where isactive='Y'
select name  from c_taxcategory  where isactive='Y'
select uomsymbol from c_uom where isactive='Y'

select w.name 
from SSWH_Withholding_Source w 
inner join SSWH_Source ws on ws.SSWH_Withholding_Source_id = w.SSWH_Withholding_Source_ID 
inner join c_tax ct on ct.c_tax_ID = ws.c_tax_ID

select ev.value 
from C_ValidCombination vc 
Inner Join C_ElementValue ev on  ev.C_ElementValue_id = vc.account_id
select ad_client_id from ad_client where ad_client_id not in ('0')
select ad_org_id from ad_org where ad_org_id='0'
